General.Name: Lotte Non-Life
General.Description: Lotte Non - Life Insurance Co., Ltd. provides non-life insurance products in South Korea. The company offers automobile, fire, casualty, long-term, marine, and retirement insurance products, as well as reinsurance products. It provides its products through professional Lotte consultants, bancassurance channels, and financial centers. The company was founded in 1946 and is based in Seoul, South Korea. Lotte Non - Life Insurance Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Victura Limited.

4.Name: Mr. Min-Ho  Kim
4.Title: Exec. Director & Head of Automobile Compensation Group
